name: Terminal Connection
description:
A hacking game where you actually need to read the code.

You are trying to break into the systems of the AMAGLE corporation, luckily for you, you have a functioning terminal and access to all their source code.

Features [Alpha]:

* Nearly 80 programming levels - tutorials, programming challenges, and hacking.
* A custom language with a fifty page manual (which is referenced from within the game).
* Robot programming.
* A terminal in which you can't even use your mouse.
* More than 30 minutes of music to hack/program/chill to.
* Basic colour blindness and dyslexia (font) options.
* Some easter eggs.
* Two pride colour themes.

Features that are coming in the future:
* A 3D environment.
* More music.
* A complete narrative.

This is a one-person project.

The game will remain free. Soundtrack (also made by me) will be sold separately.

Important notes:
* This game will connect with Steam APIs if you're running it (it has achievements). This is in no way required and will work just fine without.
* It is recommended to use the itch client to download the game as I will be updating it whenever bugs are reported.
